SEARCH
Package librarySE.utils

Class FileUtils.RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory<T>

java.lang.Object
librarySE.utils.FileUtils.RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory<T>
Type Parameters:
T - base type
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory
Enclosing class:
FileUtils
public static final class FileUtils.RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory<T> extends Object implements com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory
Polymorphic adapter factory enabling Gson to serialize and deserialize abstract types (like LibraryItem).

It inserts a discriminator field (e.g., "type") into JSON to identify the actual subtype.
